name: Fuck You, I'm a Witch™ Perfume Oil
description:
This perfume oil will help you see into the future, manifest things, attract luv, give you strength, enhance psychic intuition, protect you from all kinds of bullshit, and bring good juju into your life.

Roll this shit on your pulse points and watch the fucking magic begin...

This witchy scent is a light white sugar coated kiss blanketed by succulent fruit dipped in a deep red resin. Unless you are a Heather, you will luv this shit.

1/3oz

NO REFUNDS

★ ★ ★ 

Legal Shit, I'm not fuckin' around.

name: Cleanse Your Aura, Witch.
description:
This perfume spray will help you see into the future, manifest things, attract luv, give you strength, enhance psychic intuition, protect you from all kinds of bullshit, and bring good juju into your life. 

Now that's fucking magic witches.

Spray it in your hair, on your body, around your room, here, there and everywhere, you can even use this shit to dust. I do.

This witchy scent is a light white sugar coated kiss blanketed by succulent fruit dipped in a deep red resin. Unless you are a Heather, you will luv this shit. 

4oz

name: Violet Sky Witch.
description:
This PURPLE lightweight hoodie is perfect for all year-round wear. It features a brushed nickel zipper, kangaroo front pocket and is made from super soft Eco-Heather for a retro heather look. They are unisex hoodies and tend to run large, perfect if you like an oversized hoodie, if not order one size smaller than typical.

*LIMITED EDITION*
once they are gone, they. are. gone.

Unisex Sizing:
Regular Fit - Women typically buy a size smaller than usual, while men generally buy the same size or one size larger.

XS = Chest 34 - 36 , Waist 26 - 28 , Hip 31 - 36  		 	 	

Small = Chest 36 - 38 , Waist 29 - 31, Hip 34 - 39    

Medium = Chest 39 - 41 , Waist 32 - 34, Hip 37 - 42    

Large = Chest 42 - 44 , Waist 35 - 37  , Hip 40 - 45      

XL = Chest 45 - 47, Waist 38 - 40, Hip 43 - 48

XXL = Chest 48 - 50 , Waist 41 - 43 , Hip 46 - 51

NO REFUNDS
★ ★ ★ 

Legal Shit, I'm not fuckin' around.

name: Fade to Grey Witch.
description:
This GREY Burnout tee is sheer, slim, super soft and perfect for layering or a sexy little peek-a-boo bra. This tee features blind stitching on the sleeves and bottom hem and a 1x1 rib neckband. The vintage inspired burnout fabric is hand-treated and authentically weathered for a perfectly worn-in look and feel. 

*LIMITED EDITION*
once they are gone, they. are. gone.

Women Sizing:
Slim Fit - Fits closely to the body for a slimmer silhouette.

XS = Bust 30 - 32, Waist 24 - 26, Hip 34 - 36 		 	 	

Small = Bust 32 - 34, Waist 26 - 28, Hip 36 - 38     

Medium = Bust34 - 36, Waist 28 - 30, Hip 38 - 40    

Large = Bust 36 - 38, Waist 30 - 32, Hip 40 - 42       

XL = Bust 39 - 40, Waist 32 - 34, Hip 42 - 44 


NO REFUNDS
